name: THE MOUSE (angel osike)
description:
THE MOUSE is a small metroidvania made with two colors palette. You are a mouse, your mission is to complete the labyrinth and  find the big piece of cheese

CONTROLS

x = to attack

z = to dash

esc = to pause

arrow key = to move and jump

CREDITS 

programmer : angel

music : Arc  Of   Dream (itch.io)

artist : angel

THANKS

to the discord group"godot"(svilupparegiochi)

WARNING

Checkpoints save your position, not your progress, so if you die and you had a key, you'll lose it and will have to get it back
